data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Kouilou, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kouilou, Republic of Congo
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Kouilou, Republic of Congo to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Kouilou who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Kouilou, Republic of Congo. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Arab people.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Kouilou.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 644,844 people in the state of Kouilou who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: God, guide the 132,572 believers in Kouilou to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

location.name: Kouilou
location.people_groups_list: Arab, Teke, Northern, Hausa, South Asian, general, Mbosi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Arab (1,200), Teke, Northern (87,000), Hausa (11,000), South Asian, general (190,000), Mbosi (557,000)
